Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy

Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy is a nursing education institution based in Pretoria, South Africa. The academy offers a range of nursing programs, including a four-year diploma in nursing, a two-year bridging course for enrolled nurses to become registered nurses, and various short courses.

The academy is committed to providing high-quality nursing education and training that is responsive to the changing needs of the healthcare industry in South Africa. The mission of the academy is to produce competent and compassionate nurses who are able to provide safe and effective care to patients in a variety of settings.

To apply to Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy, prospective students must meet certain eligibility criteria and submit an application form, along with supporting documents. The specific application requirements may vary depending on the program you are applying to, so it’s important to check the academy’s website or contact them directly for the most up-to-date information.

What to Know About the Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy Application Form Portal

The Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy TBNA Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slips, check the admission lists, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission to the TBNA application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to TBNA on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | TBNA Application Form 2024

Eligible candidates can click here to apply.

Follow the steps below

  • Visit the Application portal: https://thutobophelohospital.co.za/nursing-training-academy/
  • Choose the type of Application (Undergraduate, Post Graduate, Semester Studies)
  • Fill and complete all necessary pages
  • Pay Application fees where required

How Much is a Nursing Course at Thuto Bophelo?

Post Registration Programmes:

1 Year Diploma in Midwifery – R6000 Per Annum. 1 Year Diploma in Community Nursing Science – R3000 Per Annum.

 

Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy Application Required Documents

To apply to TBNA you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the Thuto Bophelo Nursing Academy, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.

How much are Nursing School Fees?

A four-year BSN program at a public school can range from $40,000 – $80,000 while attending a private school could cost anywhere between $60,000 to $120,000. Overall costs can substantially increase for out-of-state students.
